Html:
Heh, I responded a bit too harshly to a retard on one of the threads. Just a couple hours of ban, don't worry about it.

(This is why EJ is awesome. They cut out the stupid. Or at least try)
Pfft, I saw your response... you went easy on him.
Read the Banhammer like I do.  I lol'd.
I concur with Bloody, you did go easy on him.
Wish we could do that with some of the people we get here.  I try so hard to be nice and polite, but sometimes...

It would help if we could restructure the Discussions into a more Forum-like environment. That way we could move posts around to follow Models, etc. then it would be easier to find the same info that keeps getting reposted. Like Warlocks need to use 2.2.13 until 2.2.15
Both Astry's and the original guy's notes were hilarious, Dope.  'Screw you, I don't feel like dealing with this level of idiocy right now'.  'Come on.  You know better.'
